issueComment.body:
Configuration for item is invalid:

- Team for specified group (null) must exist (false)

> [!TIP]
> Item description should contain text that matches the following (case-insensitive):  
> `voting group[^@]+@([^ ]+)`
>
> For example:
>
> ```md
> ## Voting group
> @commonhaus/test-quorum-default
> ```
>
> Or:
>
> ```md
> - voting group: @commonhaus/test-quorum-default
> ```

- Counting non-empty valid reactions and review responses in the following categories::
    - approve: +1, PR review approved
    - ok: eyes, PR review closed with comments
    - revise: -1, PR review requires changes
